import React from "react"; import Modal from "react-modal"; import FotoPerfil from "../Img/fotoFondo.jpg"; // import CV from "../../../public/RicardoRamirez.pdf"; import "./Perfil.css"; const modaCv = { content: { top: "50%", left: "50%", right: "auto", bottom: "auto", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", }, }; const Perfil = () => { const [modalIsOpenCv, setIsOpenCV] = React.useState(false); return ( <> setIsOpenCV(false)} style={modaCv} contentLabel="Example Modal" >
